fields.text: I am away from home when I have an appointment at the clinic
fields.name: travel

fields.text: I have not disclosed my status to my extended family
fields.name: feartodisclose

fields.text: When I drink too much, I forget to take my medications
fields.name: alcohol

fields.text: I don't have enough people to support me in my treatment
fields.name: alone

fields.text: If I forget to take my medication I am afraid to come back to the clinic
fields.name: angrynurse

fields.text: I am not comfortable with the clinic staff
fields.name: uncomfortablewstaff

fields.text: I feel so well now that I do not need to take the medicines
fields.name: happy

fields.text: The medication makes me feel sick
fields.name: feelingill

fields.text: There are other treatments that I think work better
fields.name: othermedicine

fields.text: I stop taking my medication when I have a cold, or flu, or other problems
fields.name: sickwithcold

fields.text: Sometimes I just forget to take my medication
fields.name: forgetful

fields.text: It is difficult to get to the clinic
fields.name: cantgettoclinic

fields.text: Being at the clinic takes too much time, and is too unpleasant
fields.name: clinic
